document_data.caption: A map showing the Mists Gate in Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Mists Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mists Gate''' was one of three terrestrial entry points into the city of [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Location: The gate was located along the eastern side of Suldolphor's exterior wall south of the [[Golden Gate]], facing the harbor and [[Lake of Steam]].
document_data.Activities: The Mists Gate remained open from dawn until dusk.
